LanguageData.defName.desc: Description of the trait goes here !
LanguageData.defShorthand.label: Label of def
LanguageData.defShorthand.desc: Description of the trait goes here !
LanguageData.theNewPioneers.label: The New Pioneers
LanguageData.theNewPioneers.desc: A faction that aims to constantly expand their borders. -10% settlement cost.
LanguageData.mercenaries.label: Mercenaries
LanguageData.mercenaries.desc: A faction whose populace has a large amount of past or current mercenaries within. +25% combat efficiency, +$10 worker cost.
LanguageData.expertCraftsmen.label: Expert Craftsmen
LanguageData.expertCraftsmen.desc: A faction with a large number of skilled craftsmen in their ranks. +25% production to apparel and weapons.
LanguageData.argiculturalRoots.label: Argicultural Roots
LanguageData.argiculturalRoots.desc: A faction with a strong argicultural background. +15% production to food and +20% to animals.
LanguageData.researchers.label: Researchers
LanguageData.researchers.desc: A faction constantly on the verge of developing new technology. +25% research production. +$5 worker cost.
LanguageData.miningGuild.label: Mining Guild
LanguageData.miningGuild.desc: A faction with a strong culture of miners in its history. +20% bonus to mining.
LanguageData.researchLabs.label: Research Labs
LanguageData.researchLabs.desc: Scienctists spend their days researching here. +.5 base research production.
LanguageData.indoorHydroponics.label: Indoor Hydroponics
LanguageData.indoorHydroponics.desc: Food is produced indoors, protecting it from the harshes from the world. +.5 base food production.
LanguageData.firearmsFactory.label: Firearms Factory
LanguageData.firearmsFactory.desc: A factory that produces mass quantities of firearms. +.5 base weapon production.
LanguageData.rimazonWarehouse.label: Rimazon Warehouse
LanguageData.rimazonWarehouse.desc: A warehouse stocked full of goods marked to be shipped. +20 tithe modifier, +5% base tax.
LanguageData.inhouseMercCompany.label: In-House Merc Company
LanguageData.inhouseMercCompany.desc: Barracks for an in-house mercenary company. They will provide security for the colony. +1 military level, -10% tax.
LanguageData.adultEntertainmentCentre.label: Adult Entertainment Centre
LanguageData.adultEntertainmentCentre.desc: A place for the local people to spend a dime and have a good time. +.5 base happiness a day.
LanguageData.forcedWorkCamps.label: Forced Work Camps
LanguageData.artilleryOutpost.label: Artillery Outpost
LanguageData.slavePlantation.label: Slave Plantation
LanguageData.slavePlantation.desc: Slaves work the fields here. +20% food production.
LanguageData.adventurersGuild.label: Adventurer's Guild
LanguageData.adventurersGuild.desc: A place for traveling adventurers to meet up and spend a night. -15% production to food, weapons, and apparel. +5% basetax. +1 military level.
LanguageData.publicMarket.label: Public Market
LanguageData.publicMarket.desc: A public market to exchange goods. +15 tithe modifer.
LanguageData.jailhouse.label: Jailhouse
LanguageData.jailhouse.desc: A place to store criminal scum. -25% unrest gain, -5% tax.
LanguageData.wildernessGuild.label: Wilderness Guild
LanguageData.wildernessGuild.desc: A guild dedicated to taming the wilderness. +25% animal production.
LanguageData.apparelSweatshop.label: Apparel Sweatshop
LanguageData.loggingCamp.label: Logging Camp
LanguageData.heavyConscription.label: Heavy Conscription
LanguageData.heavyConscription.desc: A large number of the populace is conscripted into the settlement's military forces. -50% happiness gain, +50% unrest gain, +2 military level in each settlement.
LanguageData.volunteerService.label: Volunteer Service
LanguageData.volunteerService.desc: The military force of your settlements is by volunteers only. +20% combat efficiency, -25% unrest gain, -25% loyalty lost.
LanguageData.aFactionDisarmed.label: A Faction Disarmed
LanguageData.aFactionDisarmed.desc: There is very little, if any trained military forces in the faction. -40% combat efficiency, +10% tax gain.
LanguageData.slaveArmy.label: Slave Army
LanguageData.slaveArmy.desc: The majority of your settlements' military forces is comprised of slaves or those in forced servitude. -20% combat efficiency, +1 military level in each settlement.
LanguageData.onePeopleUnited.label: One People United
LanguageData.onePeopleUnited.desc: A society united by common cause holds the strongest of wills for the hardest duties. +50% happiness gain, +1 military level on settlements, -10% basetax.
LanguageData.diversityWeEmbrace.label: Diversity We Embrace
LanguageData.diversityWeEmbrace.desc: A diverse society has no unfilled cracks that could collapse itself. +15% basetax, +50% unrest gain, +.5 prosperity recovery.
LanguageData.royalHeritage.label: Royal Heritage
LanguageData.royalHeritage.desc: A society under the command of a royal family is unified in its traditions. +$25 modifier to tithe taxes, -10% cost to build a new settlement, -500 silver cost to build a settlement.
LanguageData.companyUnion.label: Company Union
LanguageData.companyUnion.desc: A corporation that has struck out their create their own self-sufficient trade empire. -$10 to worker cost, +1 Max worker, +2 overmax workers.
LanguageData.tradersFederation.label: Trader's Federation
LanguageData.tradersFederation.desc: A society in which those of power are those with the wealth to spend. +10% tax, -$25 modifier for tithes, +$15 worker cost.
LanguageData.scienceFoundation.label: Science Foundation
LanguageData.scienceFoundation.desc: A society that values knowledge and exploring the unknown. +25% research production. -5% base tax.
LanguageData.intergalacticMarket.label: Intergalactic Market
LanguageData.intergalacticMarket.desc: From here, ships fly in and deposit their goods and replace their cargo before returning home. +40 tithe modifier, +15% basetax.
LanguageData.glitterworldResearchFacility.label: Glitterworld Research Facility
LanguageData.glitterworldResearchFacility.desc: From this building, researchers equipped with the highest-grade tools search for the answers of the universe. +50% Modifier to research production.
LanguageData.automatedDefenseSystems.label: Automated Defense Systems
LanguageData.automatedDefenseSystems.desc: Androids roam the streets, keeping the colonists safe from external and internal harm. +2 military level.
LanguageData.minimizeTaxation.label: Minimize Taxation
LanguageData.minimizeTaxation.desc: Collect less taxes from your settlements. This will make them happier and reduce unrest. 65% basetax, +.5 happiness a day, -1 unrest a day.
LanguageData.heavyTaxation.label: Heavy Taxation
LanguageData.heavyTaxation.desc: Increase the amount of taxes on your settlements. 125% basetax, -.5 happiness a day, +1 unrest per day, -50% unrest lost, -50% happiness gained.
LanguageData.barracks.label: Barracks
LanguageData.barracks.desc: A buildings to house the local troops. +1 military level.
LanguageData.tradingPost.label: TradingPost
LanguageData.tradingPost.desc: A small outpost that roving traders frequent. +10 tithe modifier.
LanguageData.migrantHousing.label: Migrant Housing
LanguageData.migrantHousing.desc: Local housing for traveling migrants to stay in. +2 Max worker, +2 Over Max worker.
LanguageData.quarry.label: Quarry
LanguageData.quarry.desc: Torn up land being used to mine for valuable ore. +.5 to base mining production.
LanguageData.trainingYard.label: Training Yard
LanguageData.trainingYard.desc: A place for your soldiers to train. +10% combat efficiency.
